エンジン

起動

対話起動
C++ -
C# -
Java -
VB -
PHP $ php -a
JS $ node
Ruby $ irb
Python $ python
Perl $ perl -d -e 1
C++ C# Java VB PHP JS Ruby Python Perl
対話起動 - - - - $ php -a $ node $ irb $ python $ perl -d -e 1

変数・定数

変数宣言

変数宣言 グローバル変数 局所変数
C++ int v = 10; int g = 10; // 関数外で宣言 {
   int p = 10;
}
C# int v = 10; public static class G{
   public static int g = 10;
} 		{
   int p = 10;
}
Java int v = 10; public static class G{
   public static int g = 10;
} 		{
   int p = 10;
}
VB Dim v As Integer = 10; public g as Integer = 10; If True Then
   Dim p As Integer = 10
End
PHP $v = 10; global $g = 10; function foo(){
   $p = 10;
}
JS var v = 10; window.g = 10; function foo(){
   var p = 10;
}
Ruby v = 10 $g = 10 def foo
   p = 10
end
Python v = 10 global g def foo():
   p = 10
Perl my $v = 10; our $g = 10; {
   my $p = 10;
}
C++ C# Java VB PHP JS Ruby Python Perl
変数宣言 int v = 10; int v = 10; int v = 10; Dim v As Integer = 10; $v = 10; var v = 10; v = 10 v = 10 my $v = 10;
グローバル変数 int g = 10; // 関数外で宣言 public static class G{
   public static int g = 10;
} 		public static class G{
   public static int g = 10;
} 		public g as Integer = 10; global $g = 10; window.g = 10; $g = 10 global g our $g = 10;
局所変数 {
   int p = 10;
} 		{
   int p = 10;
} 		{
   int p = 10;
} 		If True Then
   Dim p As Integer = 10
End 		function foo(){
   $p = 10;
} 		function foo(){
   var p = 10;
} 		def foo
   p = 10
end 		def foo():
   p = 10 		{
   my $p = 10;
}

整数リテラル

10進 16進 8進 2進
C++ 255 0xFF 0377 -
C# 255 0xFF - -
Java 255 0xFF 0377 -
VB 255 &HFF &O377 -
PHP 255 0xFF 0377 0b11111111
JS 255 0xFF 0377 -
Ruby 255 0xFF 0377, 0o377 0b11111111
Python 255 0xFF 0377 0b11111111
Perl 255 0xFF 0377 0b11111111
C++ C# Java VB PHP JS Ruby Python Perl
10進 255 255 255 255 255 255 255 255 255
16進 0xFF 0xFF 0xFF &HFF 0xFF 0xFF 0xFF 0xFF 0xFF
8進 0377 - 0377 &O377 0377 0377 0377, 0o377 0377 0377
2進 - - - - 0b11111111 - 0b11111111 0b11111111 0b11111111

定数等

定数 列挙型
C++ const int C = 10; enum MyEnum{
   FOO = 10,
   BAR,
};
MyEnum e = FOO;
C# const int C = 10; enum MyEnum{
   FOO = 10,
   BAR
}
MyEnum e = MyEnum.FOO;
Java static final int C = 10; enum MyEnum{
   FOO,
   BAR
}
MyEnum e = MyEnum.FOO;
VB Const C As Integer = 10
PHP define('C', 10); (疑似)
abstract class MyEnum{
   const FOO = 10;
   const BAR = 11;
}
$e = MyEnum::FOO;
JS const C = 10; (疑似)
var MyEnum = {
   FOO : 10,
   BAR : 11,
};
var e = MyEnum.FOO;
Ruby C = 10 (疑似)
module MyEnum
   FOO = 10
   BAR = 11
end
e = MyEnum::FOO
Python - from enum import Enum
class MyEnum(Enum):
   FOO = 10
   BAR = 11
e = MyEnum.FOO
Perl use constant C => 10; (疑似)
use enum qw(One=1 Ten=10);
$a = One;
C++ C# Java VB PHP JS Ruby Python Perl
定数 const int C = 10; const int C = 10; static final int C = 10; Const C As Integer = 10 define('C', 10); const C = 10; C = 10 - use constant C => 10;
列挙型 enum MyEnum{
   FOO = 10,
   BAR,
};
MyEnum e = FOO; 		enum MyEnum{
   FOO = 10,
   BAR
}
MyEnum e = MyEnum.FOO; 		enum MyEnum{
   FOO,
   BAR
}
MyEnum e = MyEnum.FOO; 		(疑似)
abstract class MyEnum{
   const FOO = 10;
   const BAR = 11;
}
$e = MyEnum::FOO; 		(疑似)
var MyEnum = {
   FOO : 10,
   BAR : 11,
};
var e = MyEnum.FOO; 		(疑似)
module MyEnum
   FOO = 10
   BAR = 11
end
e = MyEnum::FOO 		from enum import Enum
class MyEnum(Enum):
   FOO = 10
   BAR = 11
e = MyEnum.FOO 		(疑似)
use enum qw(One=1 Ten=10);
$a = One;

演算

論理演算

論理OR 論理AND 論理NOT
C++ a = b || c; a = b && c; a = !b;
C# a = b || c; a = b && c; a = !b;
Java a = b || c; a = b && c; a = !b;
VB a = b Or c a = b And c a = Not b
PHP a = $b || $c; a = $b && $c; a = !$b;
JS a = b || c; a = b && c; a = !b;
Ruby a = b || c
a = (b or c) 		a = b && c
a = (b or c) 		a = !b
a = (not b)
Python a = b || c; a = b && c; a = !b;
Perl $a = $b || $c;
$a = ($b or $c); 		$a = $b && $c;
$a = ($b and $c); 		$a = !$b;
$a = not $b;
C++ C# Java VB PHP JS Ruby Python Perl
論理OR a = b || c; a = b || c; a = b || c; a = b Or c a = $b || $c; a = b || c; a = b || c
a = (b or c) 		a = b || c; $a = $b || $c;
$a = ($b or $c);
論理AND a = b && c; a = b && c; a = b && c; a = b And c a = $b && $c; a = b && c; a = b && c
a = (b or c) 		a = b && c; $a = $b && $c;
$a = ($b and $c);
論理NOT a = !b; a = !b; a = !b; a = Not b a = !$b; a = !b; a = !b
a = (not b) 		a = !b; $a = !$b;
$a = not $b;

ビット演算

ビットOR ビットAND ビットNOT ビットXOR
C++ a = b | c; a = b & c; a = ~b; a = b ^ c;
C# a = b | c; a = b & c; a = ~b; a = b ^ c;
Java a = b | c; a = b & c; a = ~b; a = b ^ c;
VB a = b Or c a = b And c a = Not b a = b Xor c
PHP $a = $b | $c; $a = $b & $c; $a = ~$b; $a = $b ^ $c;
JS a = b | c; a = b & c; a = ~b; a = b ^ c;
Ruby a = b | c a = b & c a = ~b a = b ^ c
Python a = b | c; a = b & c; a = ~b; a = b ^ c;
Perl $a = $b | $c; $a = $b & $c; $a = ~$b; $a = $b ^ $c;
C++ C# Java VB PHP JS Ruby Python Perl
ビットOR a = b | c; a = b | c; a = b | c; a = b Or c $a = $b | $c; a = b | c; a = b | c a = b | c; $a = $b | $c;
ビットAND a = b & c; a = b & c; a = b & c; a = b And c $a = $b & $c; a = b & c; a = b & c a = b & c; $a = $b & $c;
ビットNOT a = ~b; a = ~b; a = ~b; a = Not b $a = ~$b; a = ~b; a = ~b a = ~b; $a = ~$b;
ビットXOR a = b ^ c; a = b ^ c; a = b ^ c; a = b Xor c $a = $b ^ $c; a = b ^ c; a = b ^ c a = b ^ c; $a = $b ^ $c;

BOOL

True定数 False定数 True判定 False判定
C++ true false False判定以外 false, 0
C# true false true false
Java true false true false
VB True False True False
PHP TRUE (大小文字区別無) FALSE (大小文字区別無) False判定以外 FALSE, 0, NULL, '', '0', [], 未定義
JS true false False判定以外 false, undefined, 0, ''
Ruby true false False判定以外 false, nil
Python True False False判定以外 False, 0, '', (), [], {}
Perl - - False判定以外 0, '', '0'
C++ C# Java VB PHP JS Ruby Python Perl
True定数 true true true True TRUE (大小文字区別無) true true True -
False定数 false false false False FALSE (大小文字区別無) false false False -
True判定 False判定以外 true true True False判定以外 False判定以外 False判定以外 False判定以外 False判定以外
False判定 false, 0 false false False FALSE, 0, NULL, '', '0', [], 未定義 false, undefined, 0, '' false, nil False, 0, '', (), [], {} 0, '', '0'

構造

関数

関数定義 参照渡し
C++ int foo(int a, int b){
   return a + b;
} 		void foo(int& r){
   r = 10;
}
int n = 0;
foo(n);
C# int foo(int a, int b){
   return a + b;
} 		void foo(out int r){
   r = 10;
}
int n = 0;
foo(out n);
Java int foo(int a, int b){
   return a + b;
} 		void foo(Hoge r){
   r.fuga = 10;
}
Hoge h = new Hoge();
foo(h);
VB Sub foo(ByRef a As Integer)
   a = 10
End Function
Dim n As Integer = 0
foo n
PHP function foo($a, $b){
   return a + b;
} 		function foo(&$r){
   $r = 10;
}
$n = 0;
foo($n);
JS function foo(a, b){
   return a + b;
} 		function foo(r){
   r.fuga = 10;
}
var hoge = {fuga: 0};
foo(hoge);
Ruby def foo(a, b)
   return a + b
end 		def foo(r)
   r[0] = 10
end
hoge = [0]
foo(hoge)
Python def foo(a, b):
   return a + b 		def foo(r):
   r["fuga"] = 10
hoge = {"fuga": 0}
foo(hoge)
Perl sub foo{
   my ($a, $b) = @_;
   return $a + $b;
} 		未
C++ C# Java VB PHP JS Ruby Python Perl
関数定義 int foo(int a, int b){
   return a + b;
} 		int foo(int a, int b){
   return a + b;
} 		int foo(int a, int b){
   return a + b;
} 		Sub foo(ByRef a As Integer)
   a = 10
End Function
Dim n As Integer = 0
foo n 		function foo($a, $b){
   return a + b;
} 		function foo(a, b){
   return a + b;
} 		def foo(a, b)
   return a + b
end 		def foo(a, b):
   return a + b 		sub foo{
   my ($a, $b) = @_;
   return $a + $b;
}
参照渡し void foo(int& r){
   r = 10;
}
int n = 0;
foo(n); 		void foo(out int r){
   r = 10;
}
int n = 0;
foo(out n); 		void foo(Hoge r){
   r.fuga = 10;
}
Hoge h = new Hoge();
foo(h); 		function foo(&$r){
   $r = 10;
}
$n = 0;
foo($n); 		function foo(r){
   r.fuga = 10;
}
var hoge = {fuga: 0};
foo(hoge); 		def foo(r)
   r[0] = 10
end
hoge = [0]
foo(hoge) 		def foo(r):
   r["fuga"] = 10
hoge = {"fuga": 0}
foo(hoge) 		未
